start.text: Double check the reactor! We're heading in!
AIS and IFF are active. Move in!

start_boss.text: This'll be a fight for the ages.
Heh! The lower decks'll sing about this!

retreat.text: Just keep moving! Get us out of their sight!
I've seen enough! Move us away!

engaged.text: All hands, we've encountered the enemy!
Fire at will! Take them down!
Make sure they hear our roar!

need_help.text: We need a different approach! This is too much!

pursuing.text: Don't let up! Keep them on the backfoot!
Now that's a target! Fire! Fire!

hull_50.text: A few decks are open to the void!
My ship is taking a serious punishment!

hull_30.text: Fires are breaking out in my life-support!
Reactor shielding is leaking! Engineering can't keep up!

overload.text: A flux overload?! We're running hot!
Get the shields back online! We're a sitting duck!
Vent and evade! Vent and evade!

death.text: Launch the pods and get clear!
Abandon ship! The hull is shattering!

victory.text: Oh, do take notes on this.
